Dionicia entre sus planes futuros planea sacar un nuevo préstamo para que compre más cabezas D. ganado lechero.
texts.en:
Dionicia S. is 58 years old.  She is married and has 2 dependents who are her grandchildren.  Dionicia is in charge of everything about the children's care, from their food to their rest at night.  The children's mother is in Spain where she went to work in order to be able to help her children.  

Dionicia lives in Chaupisuyo which is located in Vinto, in Quillacollo, Cochabamba.  She makes income selling milk from her cows.  She also makes a rich soft cheese which she sells in the central area of Quillacollo.  In spite of her advanced age, Dionicia continues to work.  She feels young because of the joy that her young grandchildren bring her.

Dionicia would like this loan to buy rabbits and guinea pigs so that she can improve her standard of living.  In the future, she plans to take out a new loan in order to buy more dairy cattle.

loans.use: to buy rabbits

loans.name: Freol

texts.es: Freol, de 33 años, es un hombre muy amable y trabajador, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposa Rosa de 42 años y esta dispuesto a trabajar muy duro, para poder tener un mejor futuro. Cuando era niño, los padres de Freol le enseñaron todo lo que debía saber de la chacra y poco a poco a medida que pasaba el tiempo, él se fue encargando de las tierras de sus padres. Ahora tiene extensas tierras de cultivo, en las cuales cosecha papa, arveja, maíz y habas, para luego venderlos en el mercado mayorista de la ciudad de Tarma. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es cultivar sus tierras, ya que es la actividad que le da de comer a su familia, lleva 13 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es cuidar sus productos de las plagas de insectos. Con el tiempo, desea alquilar tierras de sus vecinos, para incrementar su producción. Este es el décimo primer crédito con MFP, siempre ha sido muy puntual en el pago de sus cuotas y espera serlo ahora también. En su banco comunal es un socio muy solidario con el resto de sus compañeras. Con los tres mil nuevos soles solicitados, comprará más abono y fertilizantes para sus cultivos.
texts.en: Freol is 33 years old and a very friendly and hard-working man. He lives in his own home along with his wife Rosa, 42, and is prepared to work very hard in order to have a better future. When he was a boy, Freol's parents taught him all he needed to know about farming, and little by little as time passed he took over his parents' land. Now he has extensive fields of crops where he harvests potatoes, peas, corn and lima beans, which he then sells at the wholesale market in the city of Tarma. What he likes most about his job is cultivating the land, since this allows him to feed his family. He has 13 years' experience in this activity, and the thing he considers to be the most difficult is protecting his crops from harmful pests. With time, he wants to rent land from his neighbors so he can expand his production. This is Freol's 10th loan with Kiva partner MFP, and he has always been punctual with his payments and hopes to be this time as well. He is a very supportive member of his community bank. With the loan of 3,000 soles he is requesting, Freol plans to purchase more fertilizer and manure to care for his crops.

loans.use: to purchase sacks of fertilizer and manure

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy candies, soft drinks, basic grains, detergents, soups, canned goods, eggs and 'rosquillas' (a type of doughnut)

loans.name: Jose Gabriel

texts.es: José Gabriel tiene 30 años, es casado y tiene un hijo a su cargo. Vive en el barrio Andrés Zapata. Su comunidad es emergente y pequeña y solo cuenta con ciertos  servicios básicos. Desde hace más de 3 años, gana su vida brindando servicios de bicicletas, repara las llantas, pintura de bicicletas, cambio de asientos, cadenas entre otras cosas. Realiza esta actividad durante todos los días. Este es su primer crédito que será destinado para la compra de llantas, herramientas, repuestos, cadenas, pinturas, calcomanías entre otras cosas. Le dará mayores ingresos y por consiguiente le permitirá solventar más sus gastos familiares.
texts.en:
José Gabriel is 30 years old, married, and has one child in his care.  He lives in Andrés Zapata neighborhood.  His is a small and emerging community which only has access to some basic services.  For three years, Jośe has been earning a living providing a bicycle repair business.  He repairs tires, paints bikes, changes seats, changes chains, etc.  He carries out this business every day.

This is José's first loan and he will use it to buy tires, tools, spare parts, chains, paints, decals and other products.  This will make him more income and allow him to do a better job of covering his family expenses.

loans.use: to buy tires, tools, spare parts, chains, paints, decals and other products

loans.name: Denis

texts.es:
Denis Güillín se dedica a la comercialización de ropa, calzado y mercancía en general mediante el sistema de pedidos; Denis tiene 3 hijos en las edades de 9 a 20 años y con sus esfuerzo  en esta actividad ha logrado sostenerlos y mejorar cada día sus condiciones de vida.
Su actividad como comerciante la inició hace 20 años,  para apoyar el ingreso familiar que solo estaban a cargo de su esposo,hoy fallecido y también comerciante; así fue como Dennis se empeño en generar mas dinero para su hogar e inició vendiendo la  mercancía de él, a amigos y conocidos del sector hasta construír su propia clientela;   por eso cuando  esté falleció y dejó el legado comercial,  ella lo continuó y desde entonces ha ido extendiéndolo a otros mercados. Su sueño es adquirir una casa propia y continuar fortaleciendo su negocio, que es el sustento del hogar y que en el momento presenta una rentabilidad no menor de un 46%. Este es su primer financiamiento con la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo y con él comprará  ropa, jeans, blusas, calzado y también  víveres, para adicionar un nuevo capital de trabajo y distribuir sus productos entre nuevos clientes,porque  finalmente  tiene el desafio de alcanzar su sueño de tener su casa propia.
texts.en:
Denis Güillín's business is selling clothes, footwear and general merchandise through an order system.  Denis has three children aged between 9 and 20  and, through her hard work in her business, she has managed to continually support them and improve their living conditions.

Denis started out as a saleswoman 20 years ago so that she could contribute to the family income which her husband had previously been solely responsible for.  Her husband, who was also a salesman, is now dead.  Denis worked hard to make more money for her household and started selling her husband's merchandise to friends and acquaintances in the neighborhood until she had built up her own customer base.  This meant that when her husband died and left her his business legacy she was able to continue it and, since that time, she has extended it into other markets.

Denis' dream is to acquire a house of her own and to continue strengthening her business which supports her household and which currently returns a profit of not less than 46%.

This is Denis' first loan through Fundación Mario Santo Domingo and she will use it to buy clothes, jeans, blouses, footwear and also food products, to add new working capital and distribute her products to new customers so that she can finally achieve her dream of owning her own home.

loans.use: to buy clothes, jeans, blouses, footwear and also food products

loans.name: Orlando

texts.es:
Orlando F. tiene 23 años de edad, está casado con la señora Maria Estevez, tienen un hijo pequeño a su cuidado al cual le honran todo su sacrificio, ellos viven en la zona de Villa Pagador de la ciudad de Cochabamba. Orlando cuenta con su propio vehículo con el cual brinda el servicio de transporte, para que su familia tenga alimento Orlando trabaja fuerte todos los días, a veces madruga, otras se desvela trabajando, el hace esos sacrificios por sacar adelante a toda su familia, incluso fruto de su trabajo y la dedicación de su esposa ella pudo terminar de estudiar Fisioterapia y en este momento ella se encuentra buscando trabajo.
Orlando quiere el préstamo para que pueda refaccionar su vehículo y así brinde un mejor servicio, él está muy agradecido con la gente que por medio de Kiva le puede dar la oportunidad de refaccionar su vehículo para que pueda seguir trabajando con este.

Orlando entre sus planes futuros planea sacar un nuevo préstamo para que pueda acceder a un anticrético de una casa.
texts.en:
Orlando F. is 23 years old and is married to Ms. Maria Estevez. They have one small child for whom they care for and make sacrifices. They live in the Villa Pagador area in the city of Cochabamba. Orlando provides transportation services using his own vehicle. Orlando works hard every day so that his family has food. Sometimes up early working, he is making those sacrifices to advance his family. Through his work and dedication to his wife, she was able to finish studying physiotherapy and she is currently looking for work. 

Orlando wants the loan so that he can repair his vehicle and thus provide a better service. He is very grateful to the people through Kiva that can give him the opportunity to repair his vehicle so he can continue working with it.

Orlando's future plans include taking out a new loan so that he can have access to an "anticrédico" for a house (a special type of rental arrangement in Bolivia).

loans.use: To repair his vehicle

loans.name: Veronica Esther

texts.es:
Verónica de 20 años, es una joven emprendedora que trabaja como cajera en un supermercado llamado El éxito. Ella aplicó para un crédito de monto bajo para mejorar su vivienda.

Ahora ella sigue trabajando en el supermercado de 7:00am a 21:30 pm  para poder mantener a su hijo de 2 años. Con el préstamo quiere implementos de construcción para poder terminar su vivienda y así tener una vida mejor para su hijo. Ella aspira en un futuro tener un mejor puesto en el lugar donde labora.
texts.en:
Verónica, 20 years old, is an enterprising young woman who works as a cashier in the El Éxito supermarket. She is applying for a small loan to improve her house.

She works in the supermarket from 7 a.m. to 9:30 p.m. in order to support her two-year-old son. She will use the loan to purchase building supplies so she can finish her house and provide a better life for her son. In the future, she'd like to receive a promotion in her current place of employ.

loans.use: to purchase building supplies

loans.name: Jose Felix

texts.es:
José de 51 años, un hombre trabajador que empezó su negocio desde ya hace 30 años con una mesa vendiendo  bebidas con 30 sucres de inversión con el tiempo iba aumentando su producción. Está casado con Juana Zapata y tienen dos hijos.

En la actualidad trabaja de miércoles a domingos  vendiendo batidos y mariscos su esposa lo ayuda en las ventas desde las 8h00am a 6:00pm. Con el préstamo quiere comprar frutas, implementos para el negocio. El señor desea tener un negocio más grande y con muchos clientes, formalizar mas su negocio de marisco en cuanto al hogar quiere seguir construyendo su vivienda para darle lo mejor a su familia.
texts.en:
José, 51 years old, is a hardworking man who started his business 30 years ago now, investing 30 sucres in setting up a table to sell drinks to people. Over the years, he's increased his production. He and his wife, Juana Zapata, have two children.

He works from Wednesday to Sunday selling smoothies and shellfish. His wife helps him in the business from 8 a.m. to 6 p.m. He intends to use the loan to purchase fruit and other supplies for his stand. He'd like to expand his business and client base, and set up his shellfish business more formally. He'd also like to keep working on building his home so he can provide the best for his family.

loans.use: to purchase fruit and other supplies for his business

loans.name: David

texts.es: El señor David hombre  convive con su pareja padre de 1 hija pequeña, su actividad es de el servicio de transporte urbano (taxi trufi) es muy importante saber que para nuestra satisfacción el cliente lucha para darle una mejor forma de vida a su familia la actividad que el realiza es diaria y tiene una competitividad grande en el mercado pero aun así el cliente lleva en su mente el crecimiento personal,  gracias al crédito otorgado por la institución emprender el cliente puede realizar su trabajo sin ningún riesgo  de parar y dejar de llevar la alimentación de cada día a su casa y familia, ya que el dinero del crédito lo utilizara en el mantenimiento  de su vehículo,  el rendimiento que tiene el cliente es bastante valorado por el crecimiento del mismo.
texts.en: David lives with his partner, and is father to a young daughter. He works in urban transport, driving a taxi. It's very important to know that for our satisfaction the client is struggling to give his family a better life. He works every day in a very competitive market, but he always keeps his personal growth in mind. Thanks to the loan offered by the institution Emprender, the client can do his work without the fear that he'll have to stop and no longer be able to feed his family every day. He will use the loan to pay for maintenance on his car, which is essential for increasing his income.

loans.use: to maintain his vehicle and purchase accessories

loans.name: Ruddy Gabriel

texts.es:
Gabriel de 24 años,  es un hombre trabajador que empezó dese el colegio el arte de diseñar y le gusta esta actividad. Está casado y tiene una hija de 1 año.

En la actualidad labora de lunes viernes desde las 8H00am a 3H00pm, su esposa lo ayuda arreglando carteles y también realiza las cintas para reinas  para cualquier presentación que le pidan. Con el préstamo quiere comprar pinturas, telas, cartulinas para aumentar sus ingresos.

En un futuro  quiere terminar la universidad y ser profesor con su esposa.
texts.en:
Gabriel, 24 years old, is a hard-working man who has been active in the art of design since he was in school.  It is something he enjoys.  He is married and has a one-year-old daughter.

He currently works Monday through Friday from 8:00 a.m. to 3:00 p.m.  His wife helps him with his poster-making and also makes ribbons for the queen of any given event.  He plans to use the loan to buy paint, fabric and construction paper to increase his income.

In the future he would like to finish his college education and become a teacher, together with his wife.

loans.use: To buy paint, fabric and construction paper

loans.name: Sonnia Emilia

texts.es:
Sonnia  de 64 años, es una mujer trabajadora que comenzó su actividad hace 16 años como vendedora de ropa ambulante de casa en casa con el pasar de los años logro asociarse a un gremio que está ubicado en pleno centro comercial de playas con el cual realiza se comercio.

En la actualidad labora  de  jueves  a  lunes desde las 10h00am a 4:00pm vendiendo ropa  para sus gastos del hogar. Con el préstamo desea comprar materiales de hierro para construir su vivienda propia y tener una vida tranquila.
texts.en:
Sonnia is 64 years old and a hard worker.  She began her door-to-door clothing sales business 16 years ago.  Over time she has been able to join the trade association which is located in the beach area shopping center where she sets up her business.

She currently works Thursday through Monday from 10:00 a.m. to 4:00 p.m. and sells clothing to cover household expenses.  She plans to use the loan to buy iron construction materials to build her own house and have a quieter lifestyle.

loans.use: To buy iron construction materials

loans.name: Jaime

texts.es:
Jaime nació en la ciudad de Cusco y tiene 23 años de edad. Actualmente, Jaime vive en la ciudad imperial de los Incas (Cusco, Perú), él es una persona responsable que saca adelante a su familia y su actividad económica principal es la dedicarse como albañil. Ya son cuatro años que se dedica a  brindar servicio y le va excelente. Jaime tiene un pequeño familiar con su esposa Beatriz que consiste en llevar carne de  veces en cuando a la ciudad de Puerto Maldonado. Jaime en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar más carne. 

Jaime es una persona responsable que pertenece al banco comunal “Sumac Purisisun” de la Asociación Arariwa de la ciudad del Cusco, Perú.
texts.en:
Jaime was born in Cusco and is 23 years old.  Currently Jaime lives in the Imperial City of the Incas (Cusco, Perú).  He is a responsible person who moves his family ahead.  His main economic activity is being a Bricklayer.  He’s worked at this job for four years and he does excellently well.

Jaime and his wife, Beatriz, have a small family business consisting in taking meat occasionally to the city of Puerto Maldonado.  On this occasion, Jaime needs a loan to buy more meat.

Jaime is a responsible person and a member of Asociación Arariwa’s “Sumac Purisisun” communal bank in the city of Cusco, Perú.

loans.use: to buy more meat.

loans.name: María Dirmania

texts.es:
El Banco Comunal Dios Con Nosotros  que se reúne cada quince días en la ciudadela  el Florón  de la ciudad de Portoviejo, capital manabita conocida como la Ciudad del Valle por encontrarse rodeada de muchos cerros.

Aquí conocimos a la señora María, tiene 37 años de edad, mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual  tiene un hijo  de tres años el cual es su tesoro más preciado ya que no podía tener hijos y fue como una bendición. Su marido trabaja en Guayaquil.

Ella es una gran ama de casa que tiene un pequeño restaurante, el mismo que empezó con el crédito anterior, da gracias a  Dios y la Fundación Espoir por el crédito  ya que   pudo por fin echar a andar su negocio. Trabaja cuatro días a la semana y en estos días prepara desayunos y almuerzos,  nos cuenta que a pesar de que tiene poco tiempo su negocio  anda muy bien.
 
Este crédito lo va a emplear en comprar víveres para preparar los alimentos, una licuadora y ciertas cosas que aún le faltan en su negocio. Este es su cuarto ciclo en el Banco Comunal y le gusta por la ayuda que le han dado.

Su sueño es agrandar mas su negocio.
texts.en:
The "Dios con Nosotros" communal bank meets every two weeks in the Florón neighborhood of the city of Portoviejo, which is known as the Ciudad del Valle (valley city)  because it is surrounded by mountains.

Here we meet Mrs. María who is 37 years old.  She has a common-law husband and a three year-old son who is her most prized treasure.  Before she was unable to have children, so he was like a blessing.  Her husband works in Guayaquil.

She is a grand homemaker and has a small restaurant which she began with a previous loan.  She is grateful to God and to the Espoir Foundation for the loan which allowed her to get started.  She works four days a week preparing breakfast and lunch.   She says that despite the fact that she doesn't spend a lot of time working, business is going well.

This loan will be used to buy food ingredients, a blender and other supplies that she needs.  This is her fourth loan through the communal bank and she appreciates the help she has received.

Her dream is to expand her business.

loans.use: To buy food ingredients, a blender and other supplies

loans.name: Anconeras Emprendedoras Group

texts.es:
El esposo D. Flor se dedica a la pesca artesanal por más D. 40 años  ella y su familia  viven  en Ancón un puerto pesquero al norte D. lima, su negocio empezó  cuando ella se dio cuenta que los pescadores D. la zona requerían D. algunos instrumentos D. pesca sobretodo  redes que son muy necesarias para el trabajo que ellos realizan, fue  con  su primer préstamo D.  EDAPROSPO que pudo comprar algunas redes para incursionar en este negocio, sus  primeras redes  las  puso en alquiler  la temporada D. verano es muy buena por que tiene mucha demanda, este mes fue un poco difícil debido al tsunami ocurrido en Japón ya que pocos se animaron a entrar al mar, su préstamo actual le servirá para comprar mas redes y también reparar las que están deterioradas ella quiere mantenerse en este negocio y seguir creciendo, Flor es la secretaria del grupo “ANCONERAS EMPRENDEDORAS” ella es feliz por pertenecer a este grupo que la ayuda a seguir creciendo  en su negocio.

* Flor es la quinta D. las paradas viste polo celeste, en la foto también aparece una invitada del grupo.
texts.en:
For over 40 years Flor's husband has dedicated his life to artisan fishing.  She and her family live in Ancón which is a fishing port north of Lima.  She began her business when she realized that some fisherman in the area needed fishing supplies, especially the nets they use.  With her first loan through EDAPROSPO she bought several nets to get started.  

She began renting the nets in the summer months when demand was the highest.  This month business will be a little slow because of the tsunami in Japan which kept many fisherman from going out to sea.  

She plans to use the loan to buy more nets and repair the ones she has.  She wants to continue with and expand her business.  Flor is the secretary of the "ANCONERAS EMPRENDEDORAS" group, which she is happy to be a part of because of the support she receives in her aim to expand.

* Flor is the fifth from the left standing, dressed in light blue.  Also in the photo is a person invited by the group.

loans.use: To buy nets for artisan fishing

loans.name: Rosa Margarita

texts.es:
El Banco Comunal Dios Con Nosotros se reúne cada quince días en la ciudadela  el Florón  de la ciudad de Portoviejo, capital manabita conocida como la Ciudad del Valle por encontrarse rodeada de muchos cerros.

En este lugar conocimos a la señora Rosa, tiene 50 años de edad, hace varios años su esposo falleció, pero de esa relación tuvo tres hijos todos mayores de edad, solo su hija que es soltera vive con ella. Es socia fundadora del Banco comunal y le gusta porque en las reuniones comparte con sus amigas.

Tiene un pequeño restaurante en su casa, en el cual prepara para la venta deliciosos platos, trabaja tres días a la semana desde las 16h00 hasta las 21h00 ya que solo prepara meriendas, su hija le ayuda en su negocio. Nos cuenta que tiene su restaurante por dos años y que siempre le ha ido muy bien.

Este crédito lo va utilizar en comprar arroz, carne, pescado y otros ingredientes para la preparación de los alimentos.
 
Sus metas son tener fuerzas y recursos para seguir adelante.
texts.en:
The "Dios con Nosotros" communal bank meets every two weeks in the Florón neighborhood of the city of Portoviejo, which is known as the Ciudad del Valle (valley city) because it is surrounded by mountains.

Here we meet Mrs. Rosa who is 50 years old.  Several years ago her husband passed away, but from that relationship she has three children who are all adults.  Only one daughter is single and lives with her.  She is a founding member of the communal bank and enjoys the meetings there because she is able to converse with her friends.

She runs a small restaurant out of her house and serves delicious dishes that she prepares.  She works three days a week from 4:00 p.m. to 9:00 p.m., because she only serves dinner.  Her daughter helps her with the business.  She says the restaurant has been operating for two years and business is going well.

This loan will be used to buy rice, meat, fish and other ingredients to prepare meals.

Her goal is to have the strength and resources to get ahead.

loans.use: To buy rice, meat, fish and other ingredients

loans.name: Marine

texts.es: La Sra. Marine, se dedica a la venta de Abarrotes, tiene 34 años, vive en el Barrio  el Recreo, El Esposo se dedica al servicio de transporte, tienen un   Bebe, La Señora Marine se levanta a las cuatro de la mañana hace sus compras de carne, pollo, verduras y otros. Para llevar a su venta y venderlo en el día. Las Compras la realiza en un mercado cerca a su domicilio, Su Esposo se dedica al servicio de transporte de una línea de minibús  que hace su recorrido por la ciudad , Son personas responsables las cuales tienen grandes deseos de superación. Con el dinero del crédito comprara mercadería para surtir su tienda, compra de refrescos, dulces, galletas, Tienen proyectos de ampliar su negocio a futuro y así ser un negocio en donde las demás personas no tengan que recurrir a los mercados.
texts.en: Marine has a grocery store business. She is 34 years old and she lives in Barrio el Recreo. Her husband is a public transport driver. They have a baby together. Marine starts her day at four in the morning to purchase meets, chicken, vegetables, and other merchandise to bring back and to sell during the day. She makes her purchases at the market near her house. Her husband is a public transport driver for a bus line that operates throughout the city. They are responsible individuals and they are very eager for their personal improvement. With the funds from this loan she will purchase merchandise to stock her store. She will purchase fort drinks, sweets, and cookies. They have plans to expand their business in the future in order to transform it into a business where more people will no longer have to go to the markets.

loans.use: to purchase soft drinks, cookies, and sweets to stock her store

loans.name: Etelvina

texts.es:
Etelvina nació en la ciudad de Cusco y tiene 36 años de edad. Actualmente, Etelvina vive junto con sus dos hijos en la ciudad Imperial de los Incas (Cusco, Perú), ella es una madre responsable que saca adelante a su familia y su actividad económica principal es la venta de rocoto relleno de forma ambulatoria, ella camina por las calles de la ciudad vendiendo sus productos por zonas donde la gente transita mucho por ejemplo en los mercados y centros comerciales. Ya son tres años que se dedica este negocio y le va excelente gracias al esfuerzo que pone en su trabajo.

Etelvina en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para el mantenimiento de su casa y desea comprar calaminas. 

Etelvina es una persona responsable que pertenece al banco comunal “Sumac Purisisun” de la Asociación Arariwa de la ciudad del Cusco, Perú.
texts.en:
Etelvina is 36 years old and was born in the city of Cusco. She currently lives with her two children in Cusco, which is known as the Imperial City of the Incas. Etelvina is a responsible mother who wants to move her family forward. Her main business activity is selling stuffed peppers as a traveling merchant. She walks through the streets of the city selling her products in busy areas such as markets and shopping centers. Etelvina has been in this business for three years and has done very well as a result of the effort she puts into her work.

Etelvina is taking this opportunity to request a loan to maintain her home. She wants to buy corrugated roofing sheets.

Etelvina is a responsible member of the Communal Bank “Sumac Purisisun”, which is part of Asociación Arariwa in the city of Cusco, Peru.

loans.use: To purchase corrugated roofing sheets so that she can maintain her home.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy tires

loans.name: Olga Patricia

texts.es:
El Banco Comunal Dios Con Nosotros se reúne cada quince días en la ciudadela  el Florón  de la ciudad de Portoviejo, capital manabita conocida como la Ciudad del Valle por encontrarse rodeada de muchos cerros.

En este lugar conocimos a La señora Olga, tiene 28 años de edad, mantiene una relación de unión libre hace 7 años de la cual tiene dos hermosos hijos de tres y  dos años. Su marido es ebanista.
 
Tiene un negocio de comida en el Mercado Municipal y en sus ratos libres también vende ropa por catalogo. Trabaja todos los días desde las 6h00 hasta las 15h00 en su restaurante y las ventas de la ropa las realiza en las noches pero no todos lo días ya que tiene que dedicarles tiempo a sus hijos que no los ve mucho y quedan al cuidado de su mamá. La ropa compra en Guayaquil cada fin de mes y nos cuenta que lleva en su restaurante tres años y en lo que es venta de ropa dos años y le va bien en ambos negocios.

Este crédito es para comprar víveres para la preparación de la comida, pantalones, camisas, blusas, camisetas, etc. Está en el Banco Comunal cuatro ciclos y le gusta la ayuda que le dan con los créditos.
 
Su sueño es tener un restaurante más elegante y mucho más grande.
texts.en:
Every two weeks, the Dios Con Nosotros (God Is With Us) community bank meets in El Florón neighborhood, in the city of Portoviejo.  Portoviejo is the capital of Manabí and is known as the 'City of the Valley' because it is surrounded by a lot of hills.

Here we meet Olga.  She is 28 years old and has been with her partner for 7 years.  They have two beautiful children together who are 3 and 2 years old.  Her husband is a cabinet maker.

Olga has a meal business in the Mercado Municipal (town market) and, in her spare time, she also sells clothes through a catalog.  Olga works in her restaurant every day from 6.00am to 3.00pm.  She makes her clothes sales in the evenings but not every day because she needs to spend time with her children.  She doesn't see them very often because she leaves them in her mom's care.  Olga buys her clothes in Guayaquil at the end of every month and she tells us that she has been running her restaurant for three years and her clothes business for two years.  Both businesses are doing well.

Olga will use this loan to buy the food products she needs to prepare her meals.  She will also buy pants, shirts, blouses, t-shirts, etc.  She has been a member of her community bank for four loan cycles and she likes it because of the help they receive through the loans.

Olga's dream is to own a bigger, smarter restaurant.

loans.use: to buy the food products she needs to prepare her meals and to buy clothes such as pants, blouses, t-shirts, etc.

loans.name: La Buena Amistad Group

texts.es:
El grupo  “LA BUENA AMISTAD”  esta formado  por 10 socias una D. las integrantes es Olga tiene 45 años y 03 hijos, ella vive en los Olivos, el negocio que tiene  lleva por nombre SERVICIOS D. CONFECCIONES RAVE, viene trabajando  en su taller mas D. 5 años ella presta servicios a diferentes negocios D. costura que le traen diferentes confecciones empezó solo con una maquina  poco a poco ha aumentado su capital y su mayor inversión en la actualidad son las 10 maquinas que tiene,  también ha podido construir su casa y darle a sus hijos una buena educación, Olga quiere tener su propia línea D. ropa juvenil y también exportar al exterior, su préstamo lo usara para la compra D. otra maquina para poder abastecer los servicios que le piden  sus clientes.

   * Olga es la tercera D. las paradas viste blusa morada con blanco.
texts.en:
The “La Buena Amistad" (Good Friendship) group is maD. up of 10 women.  One of the members is Olga.  She is 45 years old and has three children.  Olga lives in Los Olivos and her business is called 'Servicios D. Confecciones Rave' (Rave Dressmaking Services).  She has been working in her workshop for more than five years.  Olga provides services to different sewing businesses who bring her different garments to make.  She started out with only one sewing machine but has gradually increased her capital and her biggest investments to date are the 10 machines that she now owns.  She has also been able to build a house and proviD. her children with a good education.  Olga would like to have her own line of children's clothes and export her products.  She will use her loan to buy another sewing machine so that she can supply the services that her customers are requesting.

*In the photo, Olga is the third person along amongst the members who are standing.  She is wearing a purple and white blouse.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine

loans.name: Monica

texts.es: La señora Mónica, vive en la zona de Coqueni junto con su padre, hermanos e hijo, ella es la única mujer en la familia, ya que recientemente falleció su señora madre, quedando ella como responsable de la atención de su papa y de su pequeño hijo, quien tiene 8 años y se encuentra en edad escolar, Ella trabaja realizando servicio de peluquería como tintes masajes, manicure, pedicura, a domicilio por las tardes, ya que por las mañanas se ayuda con otro trabajo de limpieza, a la fecha ella solicita este crédito para la compra de material como tintes, cremas, toallas, tijeras, y otros instrumentos para su trabajo, es una persona joven que quiere superarse, esta agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Mónica lives in Coqueni neighborhood together with her father, siblings and son.  She is the only woman in the family since her mother died recently.  This left Mónica in charge of looking after her dad and her 8 year-old son who is in school.

Mónica has a hairdressing business.  She provides coloring, massages, manicures and pedicures at her customers' homes in the afternoons.  In the mornings she does a cleaning job.  Mónica is requesting this loan to buy materials such as dyes, creams, towels, scissors and other instruments she needs for her work.  She is a young person who would like to excel in life.  She is grateful to the institution for the support they have offered her.

loans.use: to buy dyes and other hairdressing products

loans.name: Clotilde

texts.es:
Clotilde nació en la ciudad de Paruro  y tiene 39 años de edad. Actualmente, Clotilde vive junto con sus cuatro hijos en la ciudad Imperial de los Incas (Cusco, Perú), ella es una madre responsable que saca adelante a su familia y su actividad económica es ayudar a una costurera, ella ayuda a una señora que se dedica a al confección de ropa, arreglar ropa, ella es muy entusiasta y está aprendiendo todo del negocio de la costura y su deseo es abrir su propio taller de costura. Ya son tres años que se dedica este negocio y le va excelente gracias al esfuerzo que pone en su trabajo.

Clotilde en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para uso personal, ella nos cuenta que va pagar la inscripción de la matricula para que pueda postular su hija Maribel a la Universidad y con lo que sobre para comprar utiles escolares para sus demás hijos que están en el colegio.    

Clotilde es una persona responsable que pertenece al banco comunal “Sumac Purisisun” de la Asociación Arariwa de la ciudad del Cusco, Perú.
texts.en:
Clotilde is 39 years old and was born in the city of Paruro. She and her four children currently live in Cusco, which is known as the Imperial City of the Incas. Clotilde is a responsible mother who wants to move her family forward. Her job is that of an assistant seamstress. She helps a woman who makes and repairs clothing. Clotilde is very enthusiastic and willing to learn everything about the sewing business. She wants to open her own sewing workshop. Clotilde has been working in this business for three years and has done very well as a result of the effort she puts into her work.

She is taking this opportunity to request a loan for personal use. Clotilde will pay the required registration fees so that her daughter Maribel can apply to the university. She will also buy school supplies for her other children who are students.

Clotilde is a responsible person who is a member of the Communal Bank “Sumac Purisisun”, which is part of Asociación Arariwa in the city of Cusco, Peru.

loans.use: To pay her daughter's university registration fees and purchase school supplies for her other children.

loans.name: Maria Transito

texts.es:
María de 49 años, es una mujer trabajadora que inicio en la venta de carbón mediante un vecino que se cambio de casa y no había quien lo vendiera.

Ella labora sola en sus ventas de carbón diariamente o cuando su clientes le pidan. Con el préstamo va a comprar cerámicas para aumentar su productividad. En un futuro quiere implementar su negocio de tienda con nuevos productos.
texts.en:
María is 49 years old.  She is a hard-working woman who started selling charcoal through a neighbor who was moving house and didn't have anybody to sell to her.

María works alone in her charcoal business.  She makes her sales every day or whenever her customers request it.  María will use this loan to buy ceramics to increase her productivity.  In the future, she would like to stock her business with new products.

loans.use: to buy ceramics

loans.name: Shirley Gina

texts.es:
El Banco Comunal Dios Con Nosotros se reúne cada quince días en la ciudadela  el Florón  de la ciudad de Portoviejo, capital manabita conocida como la Ciudad del Valle por encontrarse rodeada de muchos cerros.

En este lugar conocimos a la señora Shirley, tiene 22 años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene una hija de 4  años. El marido es comerciante. Este es el segundo ciclo en el Banco Comunal y le gusta porque no piden tantos requisitos para entregar los créditos y porque estos son de gran ayuda en el negocio de su esposo.

Ella es una gran ama de casa que para ayudar a su esposo realiza el crédito para el negocio de él, tiene un puesto en el mercado  de la ciudad de Portoviejo  en la que vende frutas y verduras. Trabaja los sabados y domingos desde las  05h00 hasta las 14h00 y de lunes a viernes trabaja bajando carga en el mismo mercado. Tienen este negocio tres años y nos cuenta que su esposo antes trabajaba con el papá pero después independizo y puso su negocio propio.
 
Este crédito es para comprar frutas y legumbres.
 
Sus sueños son tener casa propia y bien construida ya que viven en casa de los suegros.
texts.en:
The Communal Bank “Dios Con Nosotros” (God with Us) meets every fifteen days in the neighborhood of Florón in the city of Portoviejo, the capital of Manabí which is also known as the City of the Valley since it is surrounded by many hills.

It is in this place one can find Sra. Shirley. She is 22 years old, in a common law relationship, and has a four year old daughter. Her husband is a merchant. She is participating in her second loan cycle with the Communal Bank and likes the fact that there are few requirements necessary to access the loans because they have been a great help to her husband’s business.

Shirley is an excellent homemaker who wants to help her husband access a loan for his business. He has a stand at the market in city of Portoviejo where he sells fruits and vegetables. He works Saturdays and Sundays from 5am to 2pm. From Monday to Friday, he works at the same market unloading cargo. They have had this business for three years. Previously, her husband worked with her father but he wanted to become independent and start his own business.

This loan will be used to buy fruits and legumes. She dreams of having her own house that is well-built since she and her husband currently live with her in-laws.

loans.use: To purchase fruits and legumes.
